name: New Zombie
description: The game is made in the genre of novella, where the player will read, and make choices, and follow the plot twists of the story, the game tells the story of the military Harvey Heler, who will fight for survival in the zombie apocalypse world, the hero is waiting for a hard test and solving many mysteries, such as: Who created the virus? Where did it come from? Or perhaps the hero himself knows something? All these questions the player will have to answer, and will choose the fate of the hero, and not only ...
